## WriteApi interface

Asynchronous API that writes time-series data into InfluxDB. This API always buffers points/lines to create batches under the hood to optimize data transfer to InfluxDB server, use `flush` to send the buffered data to InfluxDB immediately.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface WriteApi extends PointSettings 
```
**Extends:** [PointSettings](./influxdb-client.pointsettings.md)

</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

HTTP path and query parameters of InfluxDB query API. It is automatically initialized to `/api/v2/write?org=...`<!-- -->, but it can be changed after the API is obtained.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[close()](./influxdb-client.writeapi.close.md)


</td><td>

Flushes this writer and cancels retries of write operations that failed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[dispose()](./influxdb-client.writeapi.dispose.md)


</td><td>

Unlike close, dispose simply quits without trying to flush the buffered data.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[flush(withRetryBuffer)](./influxdb-client.writeapi.flush.md)


</td><td>

Flushes pending writes to the server.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useDefaultTags(tags)](./influxdb-client.writeapi.usedefaulttags.md)


</td><td>

Instructs to use the following default tags when writing points. Not applicable for writing records/lines.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writePoint(point)](./influxdb-client.writeapi.writepoint.md)


</td><td>

Write point.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writePoints(points)](./influxdb-client.writeapi.writepoints.md)


</td><td>

Write points.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeRecord(record)](./influxdb-client.writeapi.writerecord.md)


</td><td>

Write a line of [Line Protocol](https://bit.ly/2QL99fu)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeRecords(records)](./influxdb-client.writeapi.writerecords.md)


</td><td>

Write lines of [Line Protocol](https://bit.ly/2QL99fu)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
